heading: Tonight
text: Scattered snow showers developing in NY, spreading east after midnight. Single digits in the northeast, teens west and south I-89. Wind diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Saturday
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers becoming more widespread through the afternoon. A dusting north to 4 inches south expected. Highs from the low to mid 30s. Light south wind.

heading: Saturday Night
text: Periods of clearing. Snow showers becoming more scattered overnight. Lows in the 20s, a few teens in the northeast. Light and variable wind.
